name: justified
caption: Justified

effect.short: Raises [Attack]{mechanic:attack} one stage upon taking damage from a []{type:dark} move.
effect.full:
Whenever a []{type:dark}-type move hits this Pokémon, its [Attack]{mechanic:attack} rises one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

The move is not negated in any way.

flavorText:
Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack
stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
